first_level.name: Animal Friendship
first_level.description: This spell makes an animal friendly to the caster and willing to serve them.

first_level.name: Detect Magic
first_level.description: This spell detects magical auras in creatures or objects.

first_level.name: Detect Snares & Pits
first_level.description: This spell detects mechanical or magical traps in the area of effect.

first_level.name: Entangle
first_level.description: This spell causes plants to entangle creatures in the area of effect.

first_level.name: Faerie Fire
first_level.description: This spell outlines a creature with a glowing light, making it easier to hit.

first_level.name: Invisibility to Animals
first_level.description: This spell makes the recipient invisible to animals.

first_level.name: Locate Animals
first_level.description: This spell locates the nearest animal of a specific type.

first_level.name: Pass without Trace
first_level.description: This spell makes the recipient leave no tracks and be harder to track by scent.

first_level.name: Predict Weather
first_level.description: This spell predicts the weather for the next 24 hours.

first_level.name: Purify Water
first_level.description: This spell makes spoiled or poisoned water pure and suitable for drinking.

first_level.name: Shillelagh
first_level.description: This spell transforms a club into a magical weapon that deals 1d8+1 damage.

second_level.name: Barkskin
second_level.description: This spell gives the recipient an AC of 5 or better.

second_level.name: Charm Person or Mammal
second_level.description: This spell makes a person or mammal friendly to the caster.

second_level.name: Create Water
second_level.description: This spell creates 2 cubic feet of pure water.

second_level.name: Cure Light Wounds
second_level.description: This spell heals 1-8 points of damage to any living creature.

second_level.name: Heat Metal
second_level.description: This spell heats a metal object, causing damage to creatures touching it.

second_level.name: Locate Plants
second_level.description: This spell locates the nearest plant of a specific type.

second_level.name: Obscurement
second_level.description: This spell creates a fog that obscures vision and provides concealment.

second_level.name: Produce Flame
second_level.description: This spell creates a flame in the caster's hand that can be used as a light source or thrown as a missile.

second_level.name: Warp Wood
second_level.description: This spell warps and bends wooden objects.

third_level.name: Call Lightning
third_level.description: This spell calls down a bolt of lightning that causes 2-16 points of damage.

third_level.name: Hold Animal
third_level.description: This spell holds 1-4 animals immobile for 7 rounds unless they save vs. spells.

third_level.name: Neutralize Poison
third_level.description: This spell neutralizes any poison in the recipient's system.

third_level.name: Plant Growth
third_level.description: This spell causes plants to grow rapidly, creating difficult terrain.

third_level.name: Protection from Fire
third_level.description: This spell gives the recipient +2 to saving throws against fire-based attacks and reduces fire damage by 1 point per die.

third_level.name: Pyrotechnics
third_level.description: This spell creates a burst of fireworks from a fire source, potentially blinding creatures.

third_level.name: Snake Charm
third_level.description: This spell charms 1-6 snakes, making them friendly to the caster.

third_level.name: Speak with Animals
third_level.description: This spell allows the caster to communicate with animals.

third_level.name: Tree
third_level.description: This spell transforms the caster into a tree.

third_level.name: Water Breathing
third_level.description: This spell allows the recipient to breathe underwater.

fourth_level.name: Animal Summoning I
fourth_level.description: This spell summons 1-4 animals to serve the caster.

fourth_level.name: Call Woodland Beings
fourth_level.description: This spell summons 1-8 fey creatures to serve the caster.

fourth_level.name: Control Temperature 10' Radius
fourth_level.description: This spell allows the caster to control the temperature in the area of effect.

fourth_level.name: Cure Disease
fourth_level.description: This spell cures all diseases afflicting the recipient.

fourth_level.name: Dispel Magic
fourth_level.description: This spell cancels magical spells and effects in the area of effect.

fourth_level.name: Hallucinatory Forest
fourth_level.description: This spell creates an illusion of a forest that can hide creatures and objects.

fourth_level.name: Plant Door
fourth_level.description: This spell creates a passage through a tree to another tree of the same type.

fourth_level.name: Produce Fire
fourth_level.description: This spell creates a fire that can be used as a light source or weapon.

fourth_level.name: Protection from Lightning
fourth_level.description: This spell gives the recipient +2 to saving throws against lightning-based attacks and reduces lightning damage by 1 point per die.

fourth_level.name: Repel Insects
fourth_level.description: This spell creates a barrier that repels insects.

fourth_level.name: Speak with Plants
fourth_level.description: This spell allows the caster to communicate with plants and animate them.

fourth_level.name: Sticks to Snakes
fourth_level.description: This spell transforms 2-8 sticks into snakes that obey the caster's commands.

fifth_level.name: Animal Growth
fifth_level.description: This spell doubles the size and strength of 1-4 animals.

fifth_level.name: Animal Summoning II
fifth_level.description: This spell summons 1-6 animals to serve the caster.

fifth_level.name: Commune with Nature
fifth_level.description: This spell gives the caster information about the surrounding area.

fifth_level.name: Control Winds
fifth_level.description: This spell allows the caster to control the wind in the area of effect.

fifth_level.name: Create Food & Water
fifth_level.description: This spell creates enough food and water to feed 3-18 humans for one day.

fifth_level.name: Cure Serious Wounds
fifth_level.description: This spell heals 2-16 points of damage to any living creature.

fifth_level.name: Dispel Magic
fifth_level.description: This spell cancels magical spells and effects in the area of effect.

fifth_level.name: Insect Plague
fifth_level.description: This spell creates a swarm of insects that causes 1-10 points of damage per round to all creatures in the area.

fifth_level.name: Stoneskin
fifth_level.description: This spell gives the recipient an AC of 0 and immunity to normal weapons.

fifth_level.name: Transmute Rock to Mud
fifth_level.description: This spell transforms rock into mud. The reverse, transmute mud to rock, transforms mud into rock.

fifth_level.name: Wall of Fire
fifth_level.description: This spell creates a wall of fire that causes 2-8 points of damage to creatures passing through it.

sixth_level.name: Animal Summoning III
sixth_level.description: This spell summons 1-8 animals to serve the caster.

sixth_level.name: Anti-Animal Shell
sixth_level.description: This spell creates a barrier that prevents animals from entering the area of effect.

sixth_level.name: Conjure Fire Elemental
sixth_level.description: This spell summons a fire elemental to serve the caster.

sixth_level.name: Control Weather
sixth_level.description: This spell allows the caster to control the weather in the area of effect.

sixth_level.name: Feeblemind
sixth_level.description: This spell reduces the target's Intelligence to 1, making them unable to cast spells or use magic items.

sixth_level.name: Fire Seeds
sixth_level.description: This spell transforms acorns or holly berries into explosive missiles that cause 1-8 points of damage each.

sixth_level.name: Heal
sixth_level.description: This spell heals all damage and removes all diseases and poisons from the recipient.

sixth_level.name: Heroes' Feast
sixth_level.description: This spell creates a feast that heals 1-8 points of damage and gives +1 to attack rolls and saving throws for 12 hours.

sixth_level.name: Part Water
sixth_level.description: This spell parts a body of water, creating a dry path through it.

sixth_level.name: Transport via Plants
sixth_level.description: This spell allows the caster and up to 3 others to instantly travel to another plant of the same type.

sixth_level.name: Wall of Thorns
sixth_level.description: This spell creates a wall of thorns that causes 1-6 points of damage to creatures passing through it.

seventh_level.name: Animate Rock
seventh_level.description: This spell animates 1-4 rocks to fight for the caster.

seventh_level.name: Chariot of Sustarre
seventh_level.description: This spell creates a magical chariot that can fly and carry the caster and up to 7 others.

seventh_level.name: Conjure Earth Elemental
seventh_level.description: This spell summons an earth elemental to serve the caster.

seventh_level.name: Conjure Water Elemental
seventh_level.description: This spell summons a water elemental to serve the caster.

seventh_level.name: Creeping Doom
seventh_level.description: This spell creates a swarm of insects that causes 1-10 points of damage per round to all creatures in the area.

seventh_level.name: Fire Storm
seventh_level.description: This spell creates a storm of fire that causes 2-20 points of damage to all creatures in the area.

seventh_level.name: Reincarnate
seventh_level.description: This spell brings a dead creature back to life in a new body.

seventh_level.name: Regenerate
seventh_level.description: This spell regenerates lost limbs and organs of the recipient.

seventh_level.name: Sunray
seventh_level.description: This spell creates a beam of sunlight that causes 4-32 points of damage to undead creatures and may blind other creatures.

seventh_level.name: Transmute Metal to Wood
seventh_level.description: This spell transforms metal into wood.

seventh_level.name: Wind Walk
seventh_level.description: This spell transforms the caster and up to 3 others into mist, allowing them to fly at great speed.
